contentBlocks.title: For a Sole-Occupancy Unit of a Class 2 Building (satisfying J1P2)
items: J3D3, using house energy rating software; or
the following—
(a) J3D4, for ceiling fans; and
(b) (i) J3D5, J3D6, J4D3, J4D7(3), J4D7(4) and Part J5, for general thermal construction; and
(ii) J3D7, for roofs; and
(iii) J3D8 and J3D11 to J3D13, or J3D9, for walls and glazing; and
(iv) J3D10, for floors

contentBlocks.title: For a Sole-Occupancy Unit of a Class 2 Building (satisfying J1P3)

customConditions.comment: Total Area of Habitable Rooms ≤ 500 m²

items: (a) for the net equivalent energy usage—
(i) J3D14, for a sole-occupancy unit with a total floor area not greater than 500 m²; or
(ii) J3D15, using house energy rating software; and
(b) J6D7, for air-conditioning; and
(c) J7D3, for artificial lighting; and
(d) J8D3, for heated water supply; and
(e) J8D4, for swimming pool and spa pool plant; and
(f) J9D3, for facilities for energy monitoring

contentBlocks.title: For a Class 4 Part of a Building (satisfying J1P2)
items: J3D3, using house energy rating software; or
the following—
(a) J3D4, for ceiling fans; and
(b) (i) J3D5, J3D6, J4D3, J4D7(3), J4D7(4) and Part J5, for general thermal construction; and
(ii) J3D7, for roofs; and
(iii) J3D8 and J3D11 to J3D13, or J3D9, for walls and glazing; and
(iv) J3D10, for floors

contentBlocks.title: For a Class 4 Part of a Building (satisfying J1P3)

customConditions.comment: Total Area of Habitable Rooms ≤ 500 m²

items: (a) for the net equivalent energy usage—
(i) J3D14, for a Class 4 part with a total floor area not greater than 500 m²; or
(ii) J3D15, using house energy rating software; and
(b) J6D7, for air-conditioning; and
(c) J7D3, for artificial lighting; and
(d) J8D3, for heated water supply; and
(e) J8D4, for swimming pool and spa pool plant; and
(f) J9D3, for facilities for energy monitoring

contentBlocks.title: For a Class 3 Building (satisfying J1P1)
items: (a) Part J5, for building sealing; and
(b) Part J6, for air-conditioning and ventilation; and
(c) Part J7, for artificial lighting and power; and
(d) Part J8, for heated water supply and swimming pool and spa pool plant; and
(e) J9D3, for facilities for energy monitoring

contentBlocks.title: For Class 5, 6, 7 or 8 Buildings (satisfying J1P1)
items: (a) Part J5, for building sealing; and
(b) Part J6, for air-conditioning and ventilation; and
(c) Part J7, for artificial lighting and power; and
(d) Part J8, for heated water supply and swimming pool and spa pool plant; and
(e) J9D3, for facilities for energy monitoring
